data.name: Devil Girl
data.detailed_description:
üíòCHECK THIS OUT!üíò

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1924990/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1850270/


üíòCHECK THIS OUT!üíò

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1778290/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1925210/


About the Game

When you gaze at the abyss, the abyss also gazes at you.

‚óÜFeatured Systems

‚óáFull CG mode can be turned on in the environment setting, and HCG can be freely browsed.
‚óáPressure-Free Operation Support one-click mouse operation-Fast text-to-text system

‚óÜStory

‚ÄúHey, wake up, how long are you going to sleep?"
A young girl with blond hair and red pupils was sitting on a chair, looking at me proudly, rubbing her eyes.

The girl said she was an angel sent from heaven to save my lonely soul.
She told me that I could do whatever I wish to her from now on.
"Whether it's a sex thing or anything ..... is fine!"

I had been single for 30 years and had never even touched a girl's hand, but it all came so suddenly .....
How was I going to get along with this girl?

The world became increasingly strange and bizarre since this girl appeared.
What on earth was going on in the world?

‚óÜPlay Method

The main play method is to live with the beautiful girl "Nethia", who can do whatever you want.
You can also take Nethia on trips to various places to enjoy the feeling of love, increase emotions, and unlock various sweet events.

The game has a large number of costumes and a variety of fun props.
You can unlock all kinds of H-positions, and you can also let the girls wear all kinds of H-clothes to match H.
You can even play SM with a rope and even bondage H. But in a life that looks like paradise, there are irrational and bizarre things everywhere.

If you persist in your quest, inexplicable fears, and strange events will come one after another.

Would you rather sink into a dream, or overcome all your fears and discover the truth of the world?

‚óÜGame Features

‚óá41 basic CGs, including more than 200 differences.

‚óáThe heroin can change 8 different sets of clothes
‚óáGame text 80,000 words.
‚óáLove building, + Cthulhu weird style game.
‚óáContains two completely voiced female characters throughout the entirety of the game.
‚óáGame endings: 7 kinds

telegram : https://t.me/bananaKingH

data.short_description: "Devil Girl" is a game that combines love building with the Cthulhu weird style. One day, you wake up and find a beautiful girl with whom you can live happily and do all kinds of H things or explore the truths of the world‚Ä¶‚Ä¶..
data.supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese*, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Korean, Italian, Polish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or Later
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or Later
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content,  . All characters are over 20 years old.
